name: Tetrominos Multiplayer
description:
Tetrominos is a project I made for an university assignment.

Description

It's Tetris! Is there any more to say? 

Yes, but not much. You can create an account, login and play! Host/join a server with a specific IP-Address and port or play solo (after hosting a server). You must open the given port in your router's settings in order for other players to be able to join. Alternatively, using software like Hamachi works just as well.

Controls
  • WASD or left/right arrow keys: Move Tetromino
  • Space or arrow down: Make Tetromino fall fast

Feedback

I would love to hear what you think! Either comment here or message me on Discord (Lophee#4625) if you want. Don't be shy, feedback is always welcome :)
